**World War 2**

**Aircraft**

**For BDA**

![3E0B349D69DF962EF7F03760A582D5DE7CBB792D](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/43129702101572099/3E0B349D69DF962EF7F03760A582D5DE7CBB792D/)

**Please post feedback!**

[Curse Page](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231733-world-war-2-aircraft-for-bd-armoury)

* * *

Here's some pics of planes, not all of them as i haven't gotten that far yet, but hey who's complaining:

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a//h4x27)

**Current Aircraft (0.1.01):**

**Allies**

- La-7
- Bristol Beaufighter
- Hawker Sea Fury
- Westland Whirlwind
- Fairy Swordfish
- F4U - Corsair
- Westland Lysander
- Gloster Meteor
- De Havilland Mosquito (not particularly happy with it!)
- P-80 Shooting Star
- Yak-15
- P-40B Kittyhawk
- Westland Whirlwind
- Vickers Wellington
- XF5U

**Axis**

- Fw-190 D9
- Arado-234 - Blitz
- Heinkel Lerche
- Ju-87 - Stuka
- Bf-109
- Cant Z.1007 Bis - Alcione
- Me-262
- He-162
- Bf-110
- Do-335

**Planned Aircraft:**

- Bf-109Z
- Westland Welkin
- Horten Ho 229

* * *

**Mods list:**

1. [BD Armoury](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-3-%28critical-fixes-improved-AI%29-Dev-Thread-May-30)
2. [KAX (Kerbal Aircaft Expansion)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-1-0-2-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-5-1)
3. [BD Adjustable Landing Gear](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-1-0-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-2-0-%28mass-cost-scaling-tech-nodes-drag%29-May-30)
4. [Tweakscale](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693)
5. [CoffeeSE's Cockpits](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98041-WIP-Some-stuff-I-ve-been-working-on-WWII-Cockpits-Propeller-Engines-VentureStar)+[Another cockpit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112067-0-90-K6M8-1-25m-Inline-Cockpit-Custom-IVA)

**Recommended** **Mods:**

- [Chatterer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92324-1-0-4-Chatterer-v-0-9-6-SSTV-is-science-!-13-Jul-2015)
- [Destruction Effects](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109952-1-0-x-Destruction-Effects-%28flames-and-smoke-on-joint-breaks%29)

* * *

**Notes**

- For the cockpits mod, open the .cfg file for the Arado cockpit and change this line (dragModelType = override) or what ever it is in the config to this (dragModelType = default)
- The Alcione only has external hard-points because of the difficulty doing an internal bomb bay.
- The Stuka and Swordfish both bounce when they load upon launching. It's a bug with the Squad fixed landing gear.
- For longer battles, increase the heat tolerance of the kax radial in the .cfg.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-12T00:30:04Z" title="08/12/2016 12:30  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 12, 2016</time> by TUKE**

Recommended mods: KAX has a nice radial engine that would fit the Corsair. I know InfiniteDice's ICE added an engine that was supposed to be like a DB605, but it hasn't been updated to 1.0.2 and I know of no other mods that add an engine that looks like the on the 109 used.
Actually all but the Arado use the KAX Radial, just iv'e indulged in some part clipping to change how things look.
How do you make an image part of a post without just linking it?
Also feel free to make suggestions!

I feel like this pack is sorely missing some plane...[I can't put my finger on it.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supermarine_Spitfire)

I do understand that the wing is irritating... But I've cracked it! PM me man!

I would love to see a Meeserschmitt ME 262, or any other early jet really. Those Nazis really knew what they were doing. Because they had so many test subjects. And gold. Anyways, beautiful planes, even more fun blowing them up.

[@TUKE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/119239-tuke/) Why are u not using procedural wings, I can't build aircraft without B9 procedural wings anymore... i would not play ksp until that mod and <abbr title="Ferram Aerospace Research (mod)">FAR</abbr> are updated, i can't stand the stock aerodynamics ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> On 11/30/2016 at 6:31 AM, Skyer said:
> 
> 
> [@TUKE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/119239-tuke/) Why are u not using procedural wings, I can't build aircraft without B9 procedural wings anymore... i would not play ksp until that mod and <abbr title="Ferram Aerospace Research (mod)">FAR</abbr> are updated, i can't stand the stock aerodynamics ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

Basically? I got sick of relying almost completely on mods to build things. So I now normally make things that are almost completely made from stock parts. And heck, I think I've done ok.
